title: Technical Reference for RootLayout Component
description: This documentation provides a technical reference for the RootLayout component, detailing its structure and usage in the application.
author: Documentation Team

blocks.content: The RootLayout component serves as the primary layout structure for the application, encapsulating the overall page layout and providing a consistent interface for all pages.
The RootLayout component exposes the following methods and properties.
The `children` parameter represents the child components that will be rendered within the RootLayout.
The RootLayout component returns a React element that represents the root HTML structure of the application.
The RootLayout component can be configured with various metadata options.
The RootLayout component does not implement specific error handling. However, it is important to ensure that all child components handle their own errors gracefully.
